00026 class FundamentalMatrix : public Eigen::Matrix3d {
00027 public:
00028   FundamentalMatrix();
00029 
00030   template<class DERIVED1, class DERIVED2>
00031   void  eight_point_algorithm(const Eigen::MatrixBase<DERIVED1> &,
00032                               const Eigen::MatrixBase<DERIVED2> &);
00033   void  calc_epipoles_and_constrain();
00034   const Eigen::Vector3d & e_ij()                        {return(eij);}
00035   const Eigen::Vector3d & e_ji()                        {return(eji);}
00036 
00037   template<class D>
00038   FundamentalMatrix &operator =(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o);
00039 
00040 protected:
00041   Eigen::Vector3d       eij;
00042   Eigen::Vector3d       eji;
00043 };

00072 template<class DERIVED1, class DERIVED2>
00073 void FundamentalMatrix::
00074 eight_point_algorithm(const Eigen::MatrixBase<DERIVED1> &a,
00075                       const Eigen::MatrixBase<DERIVED2> &b){
00076   // --- A is the lifted matrix of correspondences
00077   Eigen::Matrix<double,Eigen::Dynamic,9>                        A;
00078   Eigen::Matrix<double,9,9>                                     ATA;
00079   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::Matrix<double,Eigen::Dynamic,9> >     Adecomposition;
00080   int   point;
00081   int   validCorrespondences;
00082   int   totalCorrespondences;   
00083   int   n;
00084 
00085   // --- Sanity checks
00086   if(a.rows() != 3 || b.rows() != 3) 
00087     throw("Inputs to eight_point_algorithm must have 3 rows");
00088 
00089   // --- form normalised correspondence matrix
00090   // -----------------------------------------
00091   validCorrespondences = 0;
00092   totalCorrespondences = (a.cols()<b.cols()?a.cols():b.cols());
00093   for(point = 0; point<totalCorrespondences; ++point) {
00094     if(a(2,point) != 0.0 && b(2,point) != 0.0) {
00095       ++validCorrespondences;
00096     }
00097   }
00098   A.resize(validCorrespondences,9);
00099   n = 0;
00100   for(point = 0; point<totalCorrespondences; ++point) {
00101     if(a(2,point) != 0.0 && b(2,point) != 0.0) {
00102       A(n,0) = b(0,point)*a(0,point);
00103       A(n,1) = b(0,point)*a(1,point);
00104       A(n,2) = b(0,point);
00105       A(n,3) = b(1,point)*a(0,point);
00106       A(n,4) = b(1,point)*a(1,point);
00107       A(n,5) = b(1,point);
00108       A(n,6) = a(0,point);
00109       A(n,7) = a(1,point);
00110       A(n,8) = 1.0;
00111       ++n;
00112     }
00113   }
00114 
00115   // --- Approximately solve AF = 0 by SVD
00116   // -------------------------------------
00117   ATA = A.transpose()*A;
00118   Adecomposition.compute(ATA, Eigen::ComputeFullV);
00119   col(0) = Adecomposition.matrixV().block(0,8,3,1);
00120   col(1) = Adecomposition.matrixV().block(3,8,3,1);
00121   col(2) = Adecomposition.matrixV().block(6,8,3,1);
00122 
00123   // --- Enforce zero determinant of F
00124   // ---------------------------------
00125   calc_epipoles_and_constrain();
00126 
00127   // std::cout << "Residual in eight_point_algorithm = " << std::endl;
00128   // std::cout << (a.transpose() * (*this) * b).diagonal() << std::endl;
00129 }

00133 template<class D>
00134 FundamentalMatrix &FundamentalMatrix::operator =(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o) {
00135   Eigen::Matrix3d::operator =(o);
00136   return(*this);
00137 }
